name: hyper-cutter

effect.sun_moon: Doubles cut's grass-cutting radius on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Doubles cut's grass-cutting radius on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Doubles cut's grass-cutting radius on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.

short_effect: Prevents Attack from being lowered by other Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The Pokémon’s proud of its powerful pincers. They prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The Pokémon’s proud of its powerful pincers. They prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The Pokémon’s proud of its powerful pincers. They prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.
